column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////JINYA is a chain with a few in Southern California and other states. Why does this place not exist in Northern California yet? Although this ramen place cannot compare to the likes of Daikokuya
column2: which has a near and fond place to my heart
column3: I find JINYA to serve a solid bowl of ramen for a picky individual like me. I went with a group of 6 at around 8:00 PM
column4: so the wait was about "40 minutes"
